mean_cn: v. 精心安排，编管弦乐曲，协调
mean_en: to write or change (a piece of music) so that it can be played by an orchestra
word_etyma: orchestr管弦乐队 + ate动词后缀 → orchestrate 编管弦乐曲
sentence: The conductor orchestrates the concert, making sure all the musicians play together.
sentence_trans: 指挥精心安排了演奏会，确保每个音乐家都演奏和谐。
